content:
I am trying to include Organization resources in Bulk Data Group export. However, if in include it I get Resource type [] is not eligible for this type of export, as it contains no Patient compartment, and no patient or subject search parameter. But in the fhir spec it says

"However, other resources outside of the patient compartment that are helpful in interpreting the patient data (such as Organization and Practitioner) may also be returned."

and I would like to support this. Is there any way to configure Organization resources to be included, or to manually include some Organization resources in the bulk export?
